Package org.robolectric.simulator

package org.robolectric.simulator
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.robolectric
    Package containing main Robolectric classes.
    org.robolectric.simulator.pluginapi
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppLoader
    Loads an apk into the simulator
    AppLoader.FixedConfiguration
    A ConfigurationStrategy.Configuration that provides a fixed set of values for the configuration.
    DefaultMenuCustomizer
    Default implementation of MenuCustomizer.
    KeyboardHandler
    A KeyListener that forwards KeyEvents to Robolectric ShadowUiAutomation.
    MouseHandler
    A MouseAdapter that triggers Android MotionEvents when the mouse is pressed.
    SandboxBuilder
    A Builder pattern for Robolectric Sandboxes.
    Simulator
    The main entry point for the Robolectric Simulator for use in existing Robolectric tests.
    SimulatorCanvas
    A Canvas that draws screenshots taken with RNG.
    SimulatorClassLoader
    An override of AndroidSandbox.SdkSandboxClassLoader that supports extra local Jars in the classpath.
    SimulatorClassLoader.JarCollection
    Encapsulates a collection of Jar files.
    SimulatorFrame
    The top-level JFrame for the Robolectric Simulator.
    SimulatorMain
    The main class for the Robolectric Simulator.
